title: Can't reconnect to game, getting error code

replies.body:
That type of error message is pretty good indication that there's something wonky going on with your hardware. I'm not 100% familiar with memory issues, but it looks like League is trying to use some of your RAM/VRAM but it can't because it's damaged or all being used at the time. 

Let's go through our [**Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and follow all the steps there. Let me know if that helps out, and if not hit me back up!
Weird, maybe I had everything opened at once. I've been able to play games now!
